name: jQuery.trim
title: jQuery.trim()
desc: Remove the whitespace from the beginning and end of a string.

examples.desc: Remove the two white spaces at the start and at the end of the string.
Remove the two white spaces at the start and at the end of the string.

entries.longdesc: The $.trim() function removes all newlines, spaces (including non-breaking spaces), and tabs from the beginning and end of the supplied string. If these whitespace characters occur in the middle of the string, they are preserved.
